author: The Irish Times
title: US weekly jobless claims hit new record high as coronavirus pandemic spreads
description: Numbers claiming unemployment benefit top 6m as stay-at-home measures implemented
content: The number of Americans filing claims for unemployment benefits last week shot to a record high for a second week in a row - topping 6 million - as more jurisdictions enforced stay-at-home measures to curb the coronavirus pandemic, which economists say has pu… [+2605 chars]
